summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the Traffic Code, amending Sections 11.14.277, 11.72.075, 11.72.260, 11.72.300, 11.72.357, 11.72.435, 11.74.020, 11.76.015, and 11.76.020 of the Seattle Municipal Code to provide consistency throughout the Traffic Code about "parking holidays," days on which payment at parking meters and pay stations is not required and on which most signed, time-limited parking is not enforced.
